faust_editor_integration_guide.author: Faust Core Design Team
faust_editor_integration_guide.context: This document defines how to selectively integrate Obsidian and Notion features into the Faust writing environment. It prioritizes focus, beauty, and narrative intelligence over productivity.

core_philosophy.goal: Faust is not a workspace ‚Äî it is a ritual environment for deep writing and cognitive resonance.
design_axioms: Every feature must enhance rhythm, not fragment it.
The UI must feel alchemical, not mechanical.

features.name: Bi-directional links
features.purpose: Connect characters, places, and concepts across documents.
features.implementation: When a name or keyword repeats, suggest 'Link to existing entity?'

features.name: Backlink pane
features.purpose: Show all references to a selected entity.
features.implementation: Auto-generated list in the right Inspector when entity selected.
features.ai_extension: AI suggests thematic connections based on embeddings.

features.name: Template system
features.purpose: Fast creation of structured elements (chapter, character, scene).
features.implementation: Template dropdown or AI-suggested template via /command.
features.ai_extension: AI autogenerates template based on genre metadata.

features.name: Inline metadata and tags
features.purpose: Enable natural annotation within the text without breaking flow.
features.rendering: Faint color shift + hover tooltip linking to metadata card.

features.name: Graph view (Contextus)
features.implementation: Cytoscape.js / D3.js-based radial graph in Contextus tab.
features.design_rule: Avoid clutter ‚Äî node glow intensity reflects narrative weight.

features.name: Command Palette
features.purpose: Universal keyboard interface for all commands.
features.scope: Includes AI commands, templates, exports, and mode toggles.

features.name: Offline mode
features.purpose: Ensure writing continuity without network dependency.
features.implementation: Electron local storage + periodic cloud sync.
features.ai_behavior: AI features gracefully degrade when offline.

features.name: Timeline / Kanban view
features.purpose: Optional structural overview of story progression.
features.ui: Separate modal 'Structure View' ‚Äî not default editor mode.

features.name: Natural language queries
features.purpose: Allow intuitive searches ('show all scenes with Maj').
features.ai_extension: AI parses user sentence into semantic query.

features.name: Mirror Blocks (synced passages)
features.purpose: Allow scenes or dialogues to appear in multiple contexts.

features.name: Collaboration (optional)
features.implementation: Invite-based access; 'Private Altar' mode default for solo use.

features.name: Motivation sigils / progress visualization
features.purpose: Display progress using symbolic rather than numerical cues.

features.name: AI Concept Map (Semantic Resonance)
features.ui: Interactive constellation view inside Contextus tab.

features.name: Emotional Tone Maps
features.purpose: Visualize emotional dynamics across the story.
features.visualization: Gradient curve overlay per chapter or character.

features.name: Adaptive Sound + Light Modulation
features.purpose: Ambient light/sound feedback matching narrative tone.

exclusions.reasoning: These features conflict with Faust's core design: aesthetic focus, solitude, narrative immersion.

design_rules.contrast: Each new feature must maintain visual silence (Œî contrast ‚â§ 5%).
design_rules.interaction_density: No more than 5 active UI elements visible per panel.
design_rules.state_coherence: Focus Mode disables side panels; Typewriter dims 20%.

testing_criteria.goal: Ensure all added features preserve Faust's psychological flow and aesthetic identity.
user_test_tasks: Link a character to a location and see the relationship in graph view.
Create a chapter template and fill it with inline tags.
Switch to NOX/DEIS mode and confirm readability.
Use Command Palette to call AI improvement on selected paragraph.

business_note.market_alignment: By combining Obsidian's cognitive architecture with Notion's ease-of-use and Faust's aesthetic philosophy, the product occupies a unique high-end niche.
business_note.target_segment: Writers, researchers, screenwriters, creative professionals seeking beauty and depth.
